name: Black
summary: Black is a first-person shooter video game developed by Criterion Games and published by Electronic Arts for PlayStation 2 and Xbox. And later, ported to the Xbox 360 in 2008. The game is notable for its heavily stylized cinema-inspired action as well as its sound quality and focus on destructive effects during gameplay.
